titleStmt.title: Some observations made upon the Mexico seeds imported from the Indies shewing their wonderful virtue against worms in the bodies of men, women and children / written by a countrey physitian to Dr. Burwell, president of the Colledge of Physitians in London.
titleStmt.author: Peachi, John, fl. 1683.
Burwell, Thomas, 1626-1702.
Pechey, John, 1655-1716.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Peachi by Wing; also sometimes attributed to John Pechey. Cf. NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
